1.0.name: wordpress/linkrobo
1.0.description:
If you have good Blog (with good content) and want to promote some good sites of yours/your clients this plugin is for you. LinkRobo do all job for you. You can input Urls(of your clients) and some keywords LinkRobo use for each url. LinkRobo turns such Keywords in your posts into SEO links. It has Monitor page and some Settings, your cat Export plugin settings for another blogs

Follow Installation guidelines

Please report any bug in the LinkRobo http://www.searchtified.com/contact/ starting your subject title with : "(LinkRobo 1.1)".

Thank you
